t: Hess Corporation - Wikipedia
s: April 24, 2025 - Hess Corporation (formerly Amerada Hess Corporation) is an American global independent energy company involved in the exploration and production of crude oil and natural gas. t: Amerada Hess Changes Name to Hess Corporation and Announces Three-for-one Stock Split; Company's Stock to Commence Trading Under Symbol ``HES'' on May 9, 2006 | Hess Corporation
s: NEW YORK, May 03, 2006 (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Amerada Hess Corporation (NYSE:AHC) announced today that it received the necessary number of votes at today's Annual Meeting of Shareholders to approve the change of its corporate name to "Hess Corporation" and an increase in the number of authorized shares from 200 million to 600 million, in order to effect a stock split. t: Hess Corporation | Library of Congress
s: The Hess Corporation (formerly Amerada Hess) is an American integrated oil company headquartered in New York City, and a Fortune 100 corporation.
